p.b: This week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter contains tons and tons of updated Portage packages now that the freeze has been lifted. Also included is information about distcc as well as a big thank you to all who responded to last week's call for developers.

body.p: Updates for next week's GWN will include information about how to become a member of the Gentoo Linux development team as well as information about a new documentation policy designed to maintain and improve the high quality of our documentation. Also, if you have an idea for a news story that you'd like to see featured in the GWN, please let us know. This week's story on distcc is a direct result of a reader's request.
